YaPhpDoc : Yet Another PHP Documentator
By Martin Richard - www.martiusweb.net


Usage : YaPhpDoc [path] ... [options]

Options are :

column1: Name of file(s) to parse, coma-separated
column2: Name of file(s) to parse, coma-separated

column1: Name of directory(ies) to parse, coma-separated
column2: Name of directory(ies) to parse, coma-separated

column1: Don't parse, just display files to parse list
column2: Don't parse, just display files to parse list

column1: Exclude files matching the given Regex pattern
column2: Exclude files matching the given Regex pattern

column1: Include files matching the given Regex pattern
column2: Include files matching the given Regex pattern

column1: No source given, using pwd instead
column2: No source given, using pwd instead

column1: No target given, using pwd instead
column2: No target given, using pwd instead
